gnu.crypto.cipher
Class DES.Context

java.lang.Object
  gnu.crypto.cipher.DES.Context
Enclosing class:
DES
final class DES.Context
extends java.lang.Object

Simple wrapper class around the session keys. Package-private so TripleDES can see it.
